attributes.action: Theresa May to step down as PM Or give the people the Brexit they voted for
attributes.additional_details:
If the government decide not to accept what the people voted for and deliver a soft Brexit , to me this goes against our vote 
Save 350 million 
Cut immigration
Control of our own borders
Free to trade with the rest of the world
Make our own laws , free from the pathetic European courts
attributes.background: On the 23rd of June 2016 the people voted to leave the EU , the present PM Theresa May is not given the people what they voted for , either she should resign  or be sacked as she does not have the backbone to stand up to them , We the people need a PM who is there 100% for the 17,410.742 people

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
